frame.name: Body_decoration
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame concerns the decorations that human beings have on or apply to their bodies. <ex><fex name="Dec_ind">Abby</fex> rarely wears <fex name="Decoration"><t>lipstick</t></fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Body_location
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the location on the body where the decoration takes place. <ex>Abby has a <t>tattoo</t> <fex name="BodP">on her lower-back</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Decorated_individual
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the individual whose body is decorated. <ex><fex name="Dec_ind">Abby</fex> rarely wears <t>lipstick</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Decoration
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Decoration</fen> is the decorative item that adorns the body. <ex>Abby has a <t><fex name="Dec">tattoo</fex></t> on her thigh.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Decoration_descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Dec_desc</fen> identifies a descriptor of the <fen>Decoration</fen>. <ex>Abby wears <fex name="Dec_desc">red</fex> <t>lipstick</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Picture
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the frame element that describes what shape the Decoration represents. <ex>Abby has a <t>tattoo</t> <fex name="Pic">of a rose</fex> on her thigh.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Use</fen> to which a body decoration is put. <ex>Abby is wearing <fex name="Use">stage</fex> <t>make-up</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Type</fen> designates different kinds of body decorations. Often this FE will label part of a multi-word or compound word target. <ex>Abby wore <fex name="Type">SPF 15</fex> <t>make-up</t> to work, everyday.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: mascara.n
lexUnit.definition: om je wimpers mee te kleuren, meestal donker van kleur
